title: keep getting disconnect from server message with perfect internet
body: i keep getting this message when i log into the new client saying i have disconnected and it gives me this option to exit instead even though i have perfect internet any of y'all rioters know how to fix this issue.thank you ahead of time.

replies.body: Even with a strong connection you can still have issues reaching specific servers, and in this case the game servers.  There might be  a setting or block that's preventing communication, so I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to configure your network.  Let me know if you have any questions!
